TopicTitle: Help how do I upgrade or combine my experiment control station

Articles.Content: How do I upgrade and combine my experimental control system as I have it on minimus and it wont work I brought two but idk how to combine the strength

You just set the units on the ground. If they are close enough together they will interact. I don't know what constitutes "close enough," but I leave enough space between them for my kerbals to walk around.
